advance.mayday.welcome.description: Please check the tutorial book, and enjoy the journey!
advance.mayday.goal.description: Congratulations on gathering five pumpkins! You received the Mayday Banner Pattern as a reward. You can now make a banner with it.
advance.mayday.ashin.description: You got the Ashin Pumpkin! Try wearing it or use it to make a pumpkin lantern.
advance.mayday.monster.description: You got the Monster Pumpkin! Try wearing it or use it to make a pumpkin lantern.
advance.mayday.masa.description: You got the Masa Pumpkin! Try wearing it or use it to make a pumpkin lantern.
advance.mayday.stone.description: You got the Stone Pumpkin! Try wearing it or use it to make a pumpkin lantern.
advance.mayday.ming.description: You got the Ming Pumpkin! Try wearing it or use it to make a pumpkin lantern.
advance.mayday.ashin_lantern.description: 1! 2! 1! 2! Ashin Go! You got the Ashin Lantern!
advance.mayday.monster_lantern: Score or not, face it with courage
advance.mayday.monster_lantern.descripti: 1! 2! 1! 2! Monster Go! You got the Monster Lantern!
advance.mayday.masa_lantern.description: 1! 2! 1! 2! Masa Go! You got the Masa Lantern!
advance.mayday.stone_lantern: Watch the stars, let the past fade
advance.mayday.stone_lantern.description: 1! 2! 1! 2! Stone Go! You got the Stone Lantern!
advance.mayday.ming_lantern.description: 1! 2! 1! 2! Ming Go! You got the Ming Lantern!
advance.mayday.end: Journey to Infinity: Lights up, curtain falls
advance.mayday.end.description: Congratulations on lighting all pumpkins! Please take this cane-like glow stick and sing together till we're 80!
book.mayday.content1:
§lWelcome to the Maydayland!§r

Check advancements:
Use the shortcut key: §aL§r to open the advancement tab.

Page turning:
Use the shortcut key: §9arror keys and space bar§r to turn the pages.
book.mayday.content2:
§lCarved Pumpkins§r

You can dye carved pumpkins with dye on crafting table.

options: §cred, §agreen, §9blue, §6yellow, §dpink§r

Then you can try wearing it on your head, there will be surprises!

§op.s. please open sound
book.mayday.content3:
§lPumpkin Lanterns§r

You can make pumpkin lanterns with colorful pumpkins and torch on crafting table.

Notice that the pumpkin must be on the top of the torch.
book.mayday.content4:
§lBanner Pattern§r

You can make specific banners with Mayday Banner Pattern, banner and dye on the loom.
